text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus polystachya, also called bat laurel, is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is endemic to Singapore.
text.Appearance: Prunus polystachya can grow up to 35 metres (115 ft) and the bole can grow to 60cm in diameter.
text.References:
Kalkman, C. 1998.  Prunus polystachya.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 23 August 2007.
